panels.description: All requests processed per second, including bad requests

targets.expr: sum by (status) (rate(velor_api_response_status_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", status=~"$status"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Requests By Response Status Code

targets.expr: sum by (operation_id) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", status=~"$status"}[$interval]))

panels.description: Aggregated endpoints latency per $interval, can be filtered by $endpoint

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST"}[$interval])))

panels.title: Latency grouped by method

panels.description: Aggregated endpoints latency per $interval, can be filtered by $endpoint

targets.expr: sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET"}[$interval]))
sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST"}[$interval]))

sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET", status=~"2.*"}[$interval]))

sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST", status=~"2.*"}[$interval]))

sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET", status=~"4.*"}[$interval]))

sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST", status=~"4.*"}[$interval]))

sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="GET", status=~"5.*"}[$interval]))

sum by (method, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", method="POST", status=~"5.*"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Counts by method

panels.description: Server Internal Errors (response code 500) while processing requests, grouped by endpoints

targets.expr: sum by (operation_id) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", status="500"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Server Internal Errors

targets.expr: sum by (operation_id) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", status="500"}[$interval])) / sum by (operation_id) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval]))

sum by (handler) (rate(velor_api_handlers_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])) / sum by (handler) (rate(velor_api_handlers_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]))

sum by (middleware) (rate(velor_api_middleware_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])) / sum by (middleware) (rate(velor_api_middleware_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (middleware, le) (rate(velor_api_middleware_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", middleware="cors"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (middleware, le) (rate(velor_api_middleware_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", middleware="nest"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (handler, le) (rate(velor_api_handlers_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="submit_transaction"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (operation_id, status, le) (rate(velor_api_post_body_bytes_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (operation_id, status, le) (rate(velor_api_post_body_bytes_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (operation_id, status, le) (rate(velor_api_post_body_bytes_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])))

panels.description: Aggregated endpoints latency per $interval, can be filtered by $endpoint

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation_id, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", operation_id=~"$operation_id"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation_id, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", operation_id=~"$operation_id"}[$interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation_id, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", operation_id=~"$operation_id"}[$interval])))

panels.title: $operation_id Latency

panels.description: Aggregated endpoints call volume per $interval, can be filtered by $endpoint

targets.expr: sum by (operation_id, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", operation_id=~"$operation_id"}[$interval]))

sum by (operation_id, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", operation_id=~"$operation_id", status=~"2.*"}[$interval]))

sum by (operation_id, le) (rate(velor_api_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", operation_id=~"$operation_id", status!~"2.*"}[$interval]))

panels.title: $operation_id Call Volume
